Packages 
Package Description
com.brightcove.auth
Provide both generic and specific classes for Authentication (AuthN) and Authorization (AuthZ) using 3rd party libraries such as Adobe Pass and Akamai Identity Services.
com.brightcove.auth.ap
Abstraction layer for integrating with the Adobe Pass library for Authentication (AuthN) and Authorization (AuthZ).
com.brightcove.auth.ap.delegates  
com.brightcove.auth.ap.model  
com.brightcove.auth.ap.view  
com.brightcove.auth.model  
com.brightcove.examples
The Authentication reference application classes using Brightcove video player and Adobe Pass
com.brightcove.examples.adapters  
com.brightcove.examples.delegates  
com.brightcove.examples.model  
com.brightcove.examples.view  
com.brightcove.utils
Utility classes to handle common situations
